message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $140. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can we meet in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle at $130? It's a fair price considering the value it brings.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I need to get a fair price for this product. $125 is my final offer.  It's a great deal for the value you'll receive.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110?
Bob, we're getting close.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $120, but that's absolutely my bottom line. It's a fantastic deal and you won't regret it.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
